speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I'm doing well, thank you. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account with Universal Funding. Can I first verify your identity? Please confirm your date of birth.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, I can confirm your identity. You have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of it today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds reasonable. So, you would like to pay $125 today. How will you be making this payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I’ll use my credit card, if that’s okay.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course, I can assist you with that. Please hold for a moment while I pull up the payment details.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your patience. I have the payment details ready now.
